Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item 5.02 Departure of Directors or Principal Officers&#59; Election of Directors&#59; Appointment of Principal Officers. &#160; (d) &#160; On and effective as of September 25, 2022, Joseph Gebbia was appointed to serve as a member of the Board of Directors (the &#8220; Board &#8221;) of Tesla, Inc. (&#8220; Tesla &#8221;). &#160; There are no related party transactions between Tesla and Mr. Gebbia that would require disclosure under Item 404(a) of Regulation S-K. &#160; Mr. Gebbia is eligible to receive compensation pursuant to Tesla&#8217;s standard outside director compensation package as previously approved by the Board. However, Mr. Gebbia has waived any entitlement to cash compensation, until further notice to the Company otherwise, and has joined the remainder of our Board in waiving equity compensation until July 2023 until such time as new determinations are made by the Board with respect to equity compensation .&#160;&#160; &#160; The Board has not appointed Mr.&#160;Gebbia to any of its committees, and will consider any such appointments in the ordinary course. &#160; A copy of the post published on Tesla&#8217;s website blog on September 28, 2022 announcing the appointment of Mr. Gebbia to the Board is attached as Exhibit 99.1. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit&#160;No. &#160; Description &#160; &#160; 99.1 104 &#160; Blog Post, dated September 28, 2022. Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document). &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; SIGNATURES &#160; Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; TESLA, INC. &#160; &#160; &#160; By: &#160; /s/ Zachary J. Kirkhorn &#160; &#160; Zachary J. Kirkhorn Chief Financial Officer Date: September 28, 2022 &#160; &#160;
